issue.title: [Gandiva] use ArrayFromJson in tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4202](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4202). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Most of the gandiva tests use wrappers over ArrowFromVector. These will become a lot more readable if we switch to ArrayFromJSON.
